Text:
Black bars on right/left sides are indeed cut but aspect ratio still isn't right on my 16:10 monitor. I had to select 2.21:1 with VLC to finally get the correct AR. No big deal though, it's easy to do.
Perfect sound quality, picture is ok. Thanks.

Very Good, Nice 16:10 Full-WideScreen movie.
